meanings.sent1: The uncrushed flowers stood tall in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The uncrushed box arrived safely in the mail.
meanings.sent3: She felt uncrushed after acing her exam.
meanings.sent4: His uncrushed spirit soared despite the challenges.
meanings.sent5: The uncrushed paper was smooth and pristine.

meanings.definition: Not broken or damaged by pressure.
meanings.sent1: The uncrushed can remained intact after the fall.
meanings.sent2: The uncrushed bottle withstood the weight of the books.
meanings.sent3: The uncrushed cookie jar held all the treats safely.
meanings.sent4: Her uncrushed resolve stayed strong through the tough times.
meanings.sent5: The uncrushed pillow was plump and comfortable.

meanings.sent1: His uncrushed confidence shone through his speech.
meanings.sent2: The uncrushed student remained positive despite the setback.
meanings.sent3: She felt uncrushed after receiving constructive feedback.
meanings.sent4: Their uncrushed determination led them to success.
meanings.sent5: The uncrushed heart found joy in every moment.
